pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Network Learning with the PCHC and Related Algorithms // Bayesian network learning using the PCHC algorithm. PCHC stands for PC Hill-Climbing. It is a new hybrid algorithm that used PC to construct the skeleton of the BN and then utilizes the Hill- Climbing greedy search. The relevant papers are a) Tsagris M. (2021). "A new scalable Bayesian network learning algorithm with applications to economics". Computational Economics (To appear). doi:10.1007/s10614-020-10065-7. b) Tsagris M. (2020). The FEDHC Bayesian network learning algorithm. arXiv:2012.00113.
